abstract.p: XM Satellite Radio, which plans to introduce national satellite radio band with up to 100 channels of music, news, sports, talk and children's programming, names Playa del Rey, Calif, office of TBWA/ Chiat/Day to handle its account, with billings estimated at $100 milllion for an 18-month introductory period (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: XM Satellite Radio, which plans to introduce a national satellite radio band with up to 100 channels of music, news, sports, talk and children's programming, has named the Playa del Rey, Calif., office of TBWA/ Chiat/Day to handle its account. Billings are estimated at $100 million for an 18-month introductory period.

Vicki Stearn, a spokeswoman in Washington for XM Satellite, part of Motient, -- formerly the American Mobile Satellite Corporation -- said yesterday that the decision came after a four-month review that had been narrowed to two finalists: TBWA/Chiat/Day, part of the TBWA Worldwide unit of the Omnicom Group, and the New York office of McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising, part of the McCann-Erickson World Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies. Another contender, Deutsch Inc. in New York, withdrew from the review in April.

XM Satellite Radio, which plans to introduce a national satellite radio band with up to 100 channels of music, news, sports, talk and children's programming, has named the Playa del Rey, Calif., office of TBWA/ Chiat/Day to handle its account. Billings are estimated at $100 million for an 18-month introductory period.

Vicki Stearn, a spokeswoman in Washington for XM Satellite, part of Motient, -- formerly the American Mobile Satellite Corporation -- said yesterday that the decision came after a four-month review that had been narrowed to two finalists: TBWA/Chiat/Day, part of the TBWA Worldwide unit of the Omnicom Group, and the New York office of McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising, part of the McCann-Erickson World Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies. Another contender, Deutsch Inc. in New York, withdrew from the review in April.
XM plans a television, print, radio, online and direct marketing campaign to start with the introduction of the service early next year.
